title: Corporate-Financial Networks Behind Surveillance Programs
description: Research AT&T, Verizon, and other telecom contracts and payments for NSA cooperation, NSA contractor relationships (SAIC, Booz Allen, CSC), revolving door between NSA leadership and private contractors, and financial incentives for corporate cooperation with warrantless surveillance.

key_sources.title: FISA court orders authorizing corporate cooperation
Congressional intelligence committee reports on contractor oversight
NSA Inspector General reports on contractor relationships

expected_outcomes: Shows financial incentives for constitutional violations
reprioritization_reason: Timeline coverage gap analysis - high value for unique content
